files.patch: @@ -165,2 +165,2 @@ - * The access flag {@code ACC_BRIDGE} with a mask value of {@code - * 0x0040}. + * The access flag {@code ACC_BRIDGE} with a mask value of + * {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#BRIDGE} @@ -169,1 +169,1 @@ - BRIDGE(0x0000_0040, false, Set.of(Location.METHOD)), + BRIDGE(Modifier.BRIDGE, false, Set.of(Location.METHOD)), @@ -179,2 +179,2 @@ - * The access flag {@code ACC_VARARGS} with a mask value of {@code - * 0x0080}. + * The access flag {@code ACC_VARARGS} with a mask value of + {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#VARARGS}. @@ -183,1 +183,1 @@ - VARARGS(0x0000_0080, false, Set.of(Location.METHOD)), + VARARGS(Modifier.VARARGS, false, Set.of(Location.METHOD)), @@ -217,1 +217,1 @@ - * {@code 0x1000}. + * {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#SYNTHETIC}. @@ -222,1 +222,1 @@ - SYNTHETIC(0x0000_1000, false, + SYNTHETIC(Modifier.SYNTHETIC, false, @@ -230,1 +230,1 @@ - * {@code 0x2000}. + * {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#ANNOTATION}. @@ -233,1 +233,1 @@ - ANNOTATION(0x0000_2000, false, + ANNOTATION(Modifier.ANNOTATION, false, @@ -237,2 +237,2 @@ - * The access flag {@code ACC_ENUM} with a mask value of {@code - * 0x4000}. + * The access flag {@code ACC_ENUM} with a mask value of + * {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#ENUM}. @@ -241,1 +241,1 @@ - ENUM(0x0000_4000, false, + ENUM(Modifier.ENUM, false, @@ -246,1 +246,1 @@ - * {@code 0x8000}. + * {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#MANDATED}. @@ -248,1 +248,1 @@ - MANDATED(0x0000_8000, false, + MANDATED(Modifier.MANDATED, false,
